summary: In 1857, con man Quincy Drew and his black friend Jason O'Rourke swindle slave owners into buying Jason, who's a free man, and later share the profits when Jason escapes captivity.
cast: James Garner|Louis Gossett Jr.|Susan Clark|Brenda Sykes|Edward Asner|Andrew Duggan|Henry Jones|Neva Patterson|Parley Baer|George Tyne|Royal Dano|J. Pat O'Malley|Joel Fluellen|Napoleon Whiting|Juanita Moore|Dort Clark|Robert Foulk|Athena Lorde|George Wallace|James McCallion|Tracy Bogart|Mary Rings|Don Haggerty|Jason Wingreen|Sam Chew Jr.|Al Checco|Jim Boles|Paris Earl|Lee McClain|Eugene Smith|Bill Terrell|David Alan Bailey|Danny Borzage|Owen Bush|Fred Carson|James J. Casino|Ted Christy|Vic Christy|Luis Delgado|Ken DuMain|Jaye Durkus|Richard Farnsworth|Fred Fisher|Jon Gabrielson|Bobby Gilbert|Bob Harks|William Henry|Syl Lamont|Forrest Lewis|John Marlin|Tom Monroe|Bob Morgan|Burt Mustin|Regis Parton|Jose Portugal|Jeffrey Sayre|Michael B. Skinner|Ted Smile|Wanda Spell|Bob Steele|Claude Stroud|Arthur Tovey|George Tracy|Augustin Vallejo|Maria E. Vega|Wally West
title: Los trotamundos
